name: FeliPuzzle
description:
Logic-puzzle for stimulating brain breaks – whether on the road or at home.

Approve your cleverness and speed in 6 different puzzles in several difficulty levels.
Challenge yourself or compete with your friends – Who cracks the record?

Game Collection includes the following 6 games:

Feli15Puzzle (Sliding puzzle)
Put numeric keytiles in correct order!

FeliIsle (Logic construction)
Create islands by uncovering waterways!

FeliUltranon (Simple Sudoku variant)
Find the missing numbers!

FeliCrown (Logic assignment)
Each crown needs a Guard!

FeliMemo (Memory game)
Classical Pairs

FeliSikaku (Logic blocks)
Fill the entire playing field with rectangular blocks!

No advertising!
You can enter your name!

The team at FeliGames wishes a lot of fun!
